channel.title: Cad & The Dandy
channel.description: CTX Feed - This product feed is generated with the CTX Feed - WooCommerce Product Feed Manager plugin by WebAppick.com. For all your support questions check out our plugin Docs on https://webappick.com/docs or e-mail to: support@webappick.com

item.g:title: Notch Lapel Jacket in Navy Tweed - 46
item.g:description:
Made by hand, this classic tweed jacket features a notch lapel and side patch pockets with exterior flaps. The lapels and front edge of the jacket, feature a swelled edge, a nod to the slight vintage style of the fabric. Sitting at the more relaxed side of our tailoring, it is best paired with denim, knitwear and flannel shirting.
Presented in a classic navy wool from Scotland, this textured wool is openweave, breathable and with a dry handle, synonymous with classic tweed.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Notch lapels – Soft shoulder – Two side patch pockets with flap – Swelled Edges – Fully lined – Double vent – 100% Wool

item.g:title: Single Breasted Peak Lapel Jacket in Midnight Blue Cashmere - 40
item.g:description:
A classic and formal single breasted blazer. Presented with a peak lapel and cut in a pure cashmere wool from Loro Piana.
Styled with our signature peak lapel and patch pockets. The jacket is a rich shade of deep blue that is best paired with flannel trousers and crisp white cotton shirting.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Peak lapels – Soft shoulder – Two side patch pockets – One welted chest pocket – Fully lined – Double vent – 100% Cashmere

item.g:title: Button Down White Seersucker Shirt - 15 1/2"
item.g:description:
Made from a breathable cotton seersucker, designed to keep you cool in any winter sun. Styled with a button down collar, with a generous collar roll, single cuffs and mother of pearl buttons. Best paired with denim, linen and our soft tailoring.
Cut with our house silhouette and high armhole for extra comfort and movement and featuring a top pocket for warm weather essentials.
Features:
– Button Down Collar – Single Cuffs – Single Yoke – Mother of Pearl Buttons – 100% Cotton

item.g:title: Cutaway Collar Polo Shirt in Light Grey Jersey - 15 1/2"
item.g:description:
Our long sleeve polo shirt cut in a soft, breathable cotton pique in a light grey tone.
Featuring a cutaway collar, single cuffs and straight hem, that works both tucked in and worn out. Designed to be worn with tailoring and casual wear alike. The fabric has excellent natural stretch allowing for supreme comfort, whilst retaining its elegant fit.
Features: - Single cuffs - Cutaway Collar - Stretch Cotton Pique Fabric - Mother of Pearl Buttons

item.g:title: Greatcoat in Brown Glen Check - 42
item.g:description:
Our Greatcoats are the clothing equivalent of armour, protecting against the harshest elements of winter weather. In the UK, with a climate conspiring to make overcoats wearable from autumn to spring, this a wardrobe investment that really counts.
Made from Marling & Evans in a brown glen check in rich and tonal browns that will pair well with everything. Featuring broad lapels, slanted pockets, a rear box pleat and guards back for an elegant and fitted style.
The design has heritage dating back to the 17th century. Popularised in the 19th century, as both military uniform and casual wear for the wealthy, it is still issued for inclement weather by many of today's armed forces round the world.
Features: - Guards back - Flap pockets - Double breasted - Oversized peak lapels - High collar - Inverted centre back pleat - Single vent - Internal pockets - Turn back cuffs

item.g:title: Wool Knitted Tie in Azure Blue
item.g:description:
Crafted from 100% knitted wool. This more relaxed style is designed to pair effortlessly with seasonal separates and suits, taking the edge off the formality, while retaining a stylish flair.
Textured yet soft to touch, styled with a pointed bottom, hanger loop and taped interior lining at the neck for support and structure when wearing.

item.g:title: Cashmere Sleeveless Cardigan in Oatmeal - XL
item.g:description:
A classic and hand made piece of knitwear, perfect for winter layering.
Made from pure cashmere, this sleeveless cardigan is an ideal substitute for a tailored waistcoat, but works equally well when paired with denim and brushed cotton shirts.
Featuring two front pockets, ribbed hem and tonal front buttons.
Features: - Sleeveless V Neck Cardigan - Tonal Buttons with Grosgrain Tape Backing - Two Front Pockets - 100% Cashmere - Made in Italy

item.g:title: Gift Voucher - Mackintosh x Cad & The Dandy
item.g:description:
Cad & The Dandy have collaborated with Mackintosh, offering a unique opportunity to create custom waterproof garments, combining the quality and craftsmanship that both names embody.
This beautifully presented gift voucher entitles the receiver to a custom made Mackintosh in the Granish style. From booking the initial consultation, they will be guided through the entire process by one of our expert tailors, assisting them in all of the relevant choices and fabrics available.
How does it work? Beautifully wrapped, ready for any occasion, we send the voucher out to you or directly to the recipient of your choice. All the receiver needs to do is book an appointment and let the process begin.
Read more about the Mackintosh x Cad & The Dandy collaboration.

item.g:title: Skin Food Moisturiser
Brightening 2-in-1 Exfoliator & Cleanser
Baz & Co Restore and Awaken Body Wash
Modern Black Tie: A Guide
item.g:description:
Modern Black Tie is the most extensive guide to contemporary black-tie eveningwear that has ever been published.
At 300+ pages, the book covers everything from the classics to the future of the dress code, and gives readers dozens of examples of black-tie outfits and accessories to provide them with the confidence and inspiration they need to tackle all their black tie occasions, across various levels of formality.
Modern Black Tie is written in a clear, accessible, and often humorous style. It is in every respect a contemporary title for the twenty-first-century man. The fundamental philosophy of the book is to show that black tie is an ever-evolving phenomenon, and while not eschewing the traditional tenets of the dress code, its argues that what really counts is the effort you take to dress the way you do for special formal events.
Housing ten comprehensive chapters, a directory of the world’s leading black-tie brands, and a foreword by actor, broadcaster, and writer Stephen Fry, it is the perfect reference book for anyone who is interested in black-tie or classic menswear, planning a wedding or formal event, or simply looking for a thoughtful Christmas gift for a lover of finely printed reference books.
The design, development, and publication of Modern Black Tie was managed in collaboration with Valet Magazine Limited, publisher of Valet, an independent print magazine about classic menswear, lifestyle, and literature.

item.g:title: War in Ukraine Sun Silk Pocket Square
item.g:description:
Cad & The Dandy are proud to be partnering with Ukrainian bespoke atelier Indposhiv, in this charitable initiative, in support of victims of the ongoing conflict in Ukraine, via a series of unique, designed pocket squares.
In response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, Indposhiv has created a War in Ukraine series of silk pocket squares. Featuring original and vibrant drawings from children affected by the conflict, as well as one illustration in muted colours with a final farewell theme by the Odessa based artist Tina Tikhonenko.
All donations from the sales go to support Ukraine’s Armed Forces and humanitarian charities for Ukrainians affected by the conflict via the charitable foundation Come Back Alive .

item.g:title: War in Ukraine One Dream Silk Pocket Square
item.g:description:
Cad & The Dandy are proud to be partnering with Ukrainian bespoke atelier Indposhiv, in this charitable initiative, in support of victims of the ongoing conflict in Ukraine, via a series of unique, designed pocket squares.
In response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, Indposhiv has created a War in Ukraine series of silk pocket squares. Featuring original and vibrant drawings from children affected by the conflict, as well as one illustration in muted colours with a final farewell theme by the Odessa based artist Tina Tikhonenko.
All donations from the sales go to support Ukraine’s Armed Forces and humanitarian charities for Ukrainians affected by the conflict via the charitable foundation Come Back Alive .

item.g:title: Shantung Tie in Black
item.g:description:

item.g:title: Shawl Lapel Cardigan in Geelong Wool - XL
item.g:description:
A classic style brought up to date, our Shawl Lapel cardigan in Milk Chocolate.
Made from Geelong wool, a rare breed of lambswool delivering the handle of cashmere with the body and durability of wool.
We have slightly shortened the sleeves and body of this style to create a more elegant and refined take on the classic. Featuring a shawl lapel, long sleeves and horn buttons, this cardigan can easily replace your jacket on colder days or be worn with a t shirt and denim for a classic style.
Features: – Made by hand – Shawl Lapel – Long Sleeves – 100% Geelong Wool

item.g:title: Shawl Lapel Cardigan in Geelong Wool - S
item.g:description:
A classic style brought up to date, our Shawl Lapel cardigan in Milk Chocolate.
Made from Geelong wool, a rare breed of lambswool delivering the handle of cashmere with the body and durability of wool.
We have slightly shortened the sleeves and body of this style to create a more elegant and refined take on the classic. Featuring a shawl lapel, long sleeves and horn buttons, this cardigan can easily replace your jacket on colder days or be worn with a t shirt and denim for a classic style.
Features: – Made by hand – Shawl Lapel – Long Sleeves – 100% Geelong Wool

item.g:title: Knitted Shirt Jacket in Biscuit - L
item.g:description:
Presenting our new knitted shirt jacket in a biscuit cashmere mix.
Designed to sit between a jacket and a shirt, this casual style will easily become a wardrobe staple. Crafted in an ultra soft cashmere and wool mix from Italy.
Featuring a fully knitted construction, shirt collar, two side pockets and front horn button closure. This overshirt is best worn over a t shirt or casual shirt, paired with denim and cotton trousers.
A truly versatile and exceptional piece designed to be treasured.
Features: – Made by hand – Button front – Long Sleeves – Two side pockets and chest pocket – 70% Wool, 30% Cashmere

item.g:title: Submariner Jumper in Ecru - S
item.g:description:
Our take on the classic Fishermans jumper. We mix the Aran knit texture with the styling of the versatile Submariner to create a unique style. Presented in a soft ecru, made from 6 ply, ultra heavy pure cashmere, this jumper represent the finest possible quality.
Featuring long sleeves and tall mock neck that can be worn both folded and straight up. Best paired with flannel trousers for a luxurious and elegant winter style.
A world class piece designed to be treasured.
Features: – Made by hand – Tall mock neck – Long Sleeves – 100% Cashmere

item.g:title: Knitted T Shirt in Navy Cotton - M
item.g:description:
A simple and refined version of the classic t shirt. Crafted from a navy knitted cotton, featuring a classic crewneck shape, short sleeves and ribbed hem.
This timeless design is perfect when worn under a jacket but is ideal when paired with relaxed trousers and denim.

Our luxurious Open Collar Polo in a a deep navy blue. Crafted in an ultra soft, knitted cashmere and silk mix, featuring an open polo collar, short sleeves and ribbed hem.
Taking inspiration from the 1950s, this open collar polo sits perfect when worn under a jacket but is ideal when paired with relaxed trousers and denim.
Features: - Open Polo Collar - Short Sleeves - Ribbed Hem and Sleeves - 70% Cashmere, 30% Silk - Regular Fit

item.g:title: Computer Tote in Green Canvas
item.g:description:
The Computer Tote is our classic and elegant business bag that suits everyone that needs room for everyday necessities such as computer, documents or techs. The bag can be handheld or worn by a detachable shoulder strap and is designed with a long zipper that gives you an easy access and overview of your objects. The main compartment contains of a separate computer sleeve and a large zip pocket.
Made by our sister brand Baron, our bags have accompanied elegant travelers since 1978. Our range of travel bags contain weekend bags and indispensables such as wash bags and garment bags. All are crafted from the finest materials and made to the highest standards.

item.g:title: Tote Bag in Khaki Canvas
item.g:description:
The Baron Tote Bag is the perfect everyday bag. It replaces the traditional computer bag or briefcase but has a less formal touch, while still allowing you to carry all your everyday necessities such as a computer, documents and more. The Tote Bag can be handheld or worn with a detachable shoulder strap. It features two large compartments on each side of the bag. The main compartment contains a separate computer pocket as well as a large zip compartment.
Made by our sister brand Baron, our bags have accompanied elegant travelers since 1978. Our range of travel bags contain weekend bags and indispensables such as wash bags and garment bags. All are crafted from the finest materials and made to the highest standards.

item.g:title: Safari Jacket in Cream Undyed Wool - 40
item.g:description:
Made by hand, our classic Safari Jacket features four large patch pockets with flaps, five button closure, drawstring waist and an unlined body with no padding in the shoulders. The jacket sits at the more relaxed side of our tailoring and is best paired with denim, knitwear and casual shirting.
This textured wool is undyed, with the colour of the yarn come from the natural tones of the wool, picked by hand and woven together to create the checked pattern. Openweave, breathable and with a dry handle, this cloth is unique in its natural approach and style.
Features: – Two breast patch pockets – Two patch pockets – Five button front – Horn buttons – Double vent – 100% wool

item.g:title: Flat Front Trouser in Cream Stretch Cotton Twill - 36
item.g:description:
A perennial garment, our flat front trousers in cotton are cut from a medium weight twill with slight stretch, made in Italy.
With a twill weave, giving a soft handle and subtle texture, these trousers feature flat fronts, side adjusters and no back pockets. As we would cut a bespoke trouser. The trousers are left unfinished to hem as needed.
Designed to pair with almost everything, presented in a rage of classic colours.
 
Features: – Flat fronted – Two slanted pockets – Side Adjusters – No back pockets – Zip fly – Unfinished bottoms – 98% cotton 2% Elastane

item.g:title: Single Breasted Notch Lapel Jacket in Brown Escorial Wool - 38
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, notch lapel jacket, cut in an undyed brown Escorial wool. Using only the natural undyed fibre of the rare Escorial sheep.
Escorial is a rare and luxurious wool with a history stretching through the centuries. In 1340 Spanish Royalty took possession of a unique flock originating in the North African Mahgreb to nurture on the Escorial plains north west of Madrid.
Escorial is distinctive to all other natural fibres, it has a unique crimp within the heart of the fibre, performing as a naturally coiled spring. It is this curly attribute that delivers fluidity in the Escorial fabric making a lightweight garment with extraordinary drape and crease resistance.
To learn more about Escorial Wool, read our Journal post here.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Notch lapels – Soft shoulder – Two side flap pockets – One welted chest pocket – Fully lined – Double vent – 100% Escorial Wool

item.g:title: Single Breasted Notch Lapel Jacket in Brown Escorial Wool - 40
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, notch lapel jacket, cut in an undyed brown Escorial wool. Using only the natural undyed fibre of the rare Escorial sheep.
Escorial is a rare and luxurious wool with a history stretching through the centuries. In 1340 Spanish Royalty took possession of a unique flock originating in the North African Mahgreb to nurture on the Escorial plains north west of Madrid.
Escorial is distinctive to all other natural fibres, it has a unique crimp within the heart of the fibre, performing as a naturally coiled spring. It is this curly attribute that delivers fluidity in the Escorial fabric making a lightweight garment with extraordinary drape and crease resistance.
To learn more about Escorial Wool, read our Journal post here.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Notch lapels – Soft shoulder – Two side flap pockets – One welted chest pocket – Fully lined – Double vent – 100% Escorial Wool

item.g:title: Double Breasted Peak Lapel Coat in Forest Green - 40
item.g:description: Presenting our signature double breasted overcoat crafted from a rich green wool with a distinctive, marled appearance for Marling & Evans. Using a textured Hopsack weave, the cloth provides excellent warmth and durability in the cold weather, whilst retaining a soft handle and comfortable drape. Made by hand, with full floating canvas, hand stitched armholes, chest and lapel and working button cuffs. Cut with broad peak lapels, patch pockets with flaps, half back belt and a soft shoulder to allow it to layer easily over a jacket as needed. Features: – Double Breasted – Patch Pockets with Flaps – Peak Lapels – Single Vent – Stitch Half Back Belt – Pure Wool

item.g:title: Single Breasted Notch Lapel Coat in Navy - 36
item.g:description: Presenting a new style for this winter, our single breasted overcoat crafted from a rich navy wool with a distinctive, marled appearance for Marling & Evans. Using a textured Hopsack weave, the cloth provides excellent warmth and durability in the cold weather, whilst retaining a soft handle and comfortable drape. Made by hand, with full floating canvas, hand stitched armholes, chest and lapel and working button cuffs. Cut with a classic notch lapel, flap pockets and a soft shoulder to allow it to layer easily over a jacket as needed. With a removed top pocket for a streamlined silhouette, this coat is a modern take on the classic topcoat and works as well over a suit as it does with denim and knitwear. Features: – Single Breasted – Flap Pockets – Notch Lapels – Single Vent – Pure Wool

item.g:title: Greatcoat in Cream Herringbone - 44
item.g:description:
Our Greatcoats are the clothing equivalent of armour, protecting against the harshest elements of winter weather. In the UK, with a climate conspiring to make overcoats wearable from autumn to spring, this a wardrobe investment that really counts.
Made from Marling & Evans renowned undeyed tweed in a wide herringbone design. The fabric is presented in muted, tonal colours that will pair well with everything. Featuring broad lapels, slanted pockets, a rear box pleat and guards back for an elegant and fitted style.
The design has heritage dating back to the 17th century. Popularised in the 19th century, as both military uniform and casual wear for the wealthy, it is still issued for inclement weather by many of today's armed forces round the world.
Features: - Guards back - Flap pockets - Double breasted - Oversized peak lapels - High collar - Inverted centre back pleat - Single vent - Internal pockets - Turn back cuffs

item.g:title: Extra Cutaway Khaki Flannel Shirt - 16"
item.g:description:
Made from an ultra soft dark khaki brushed cotton twill, our winter flannel shirts have a rich tone and lustrous handle. Styled with an extra cutaway collar, single cuffs and mother of pearl buttons. Best paired with denim, knitwear and our soft winter tailoring.
Cut with our house silhouette and high armhole for extra comfort and movement.
Features:
– Extra Cutaway Collar – Single Cuffs – Single Yoke – Mother of Pearl Buttons – 100% Cotton

item.g:description:
Presenting our military cut trouser, featuring flat fronts, belts loops, coin pocket and flap back pockets. Inspired from military trousers, with a classic cut and medium rise designed to sit at the natural waist.
Woven from cotton canvas these trousers will break in over time and are an ideal substitute for denim.

With an ultra soft handle and excellent drape, these trousers feature flat fronts, side adjusters and no back pockets. As we would cut a bespoke trouser. The trousers are left unfinished to hem as needed, we suggest a 2″ cuff to complete the look.
Designed to pair with winter jackets, knitwear and brushed cotton shirts.
Features: – Flat fronted – Two slanted pockets – Side buckle adjusters – Zip fly – Stretch cotton - Unfinished

item.g:title: Peak Lapel Jacket in Midnight Blue Velvet - 46
item.g:description:
Our elegant single breasted, peak lapel jacket in a deep midnight velvet.
Made by hand, our jacket features a full floating canvas, hand padded lapel, natural soft shoulders with a pronounced waist and high armhole for an elegant silhouette.
Single breasted with a signature peak lapel. Cut in a rich midnight blue cotton velvet with a smooth handle and glossy finish. Featuring covered front buttons, slanted side pockets, side vents and working buttonholes.
Features: - Handmade - Peak lapels - Soft shoulder - Kissing one button fastening - Two jetted side pockets - One welted chest pocket - Fully lined - Side vents - 100% Cotton velvet

item.g:title: Peak Lapel Dinner Suit in Black Barathea - 38
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, peak lapel dinner jacket in a black wool barathea with black silk grosgrain lapel.
Crafted by hand with our classic, structured shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
The trousers feature black silk grosgrain side stripe side adjusters, zip fly and a higher rise and tapered leg for an elegant, comfortable fit. The trouser size is a drop 6″ from the jacket size and are left unfinished to tailor as required.
Features: – Handmade – Peak lapels with grosgrain facing – Constructed shoulder – One button fastening – Two jetted side pockets – One welted chest pocket – Fully lined – Double vent – 100% wool

item.g:title: Double Breasted Peak Lapel Oatmeal Cashmere Jacket - 40
item.g:description:
Our double breasted, peak lapel jacket, cut in a pure cashmere hopsack wool.
Textured and openweave with an ultra soft handle, this elegant jacket features bread peak lapels, patch pockets and tonal half lining.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Peak lapels – Soft shoulder – Two side patch pockets – One welted chest pocket – Half lined – Double vent – 100% Cashmere

item.g:title: Safari Jacket in Olive Green Moleskin - 38
item.g:description:
Made by hand, our classic Safari Jacket features four large patch pockets with flaps, five button closure, drawstring waist and an unlined body with no padding in the shoulders. The jacket sits at the more relaxed side of our tailoring and is best paired with denim, knitwear and casual shirting.
Cut from olive green cotton moleskin with a dense yet soft handle. The fabric is woven and then sheared to create a short, soft pile. Resulting in a fabric with a suede like nap that is durable and will improve with age.
Features: – Two breast patch pockets – Two patch pockets – Five button front – Horn buttons – Double vent – 100% cotton

item.g:title: Single Breasted Notch Lapel Green Suit - 44
item.g:description:
Made by hand, our suits feature a full floating canvas, hand padded lapel, natural soft shoulders with a pronounced waist and high armhole for an elegant silhouette.
Single breasted with a notch lapel. Cut in a forest green twill weave cloth with a subtle grain and matt finish. The jacket has slanted side pockets, side vents and working buttonholes.
The trousers feature side adjusters, zip fly and a higher rise and tapered leg for an elegant, comfortable fit. The trouser size is a drop 6″ from the jacket size and are left unfinished to tailor as required.

item.g:title: Extra Cutaway Shirt in Indigo Denim - 16 1/2"
item.g:description:
Our extra cutaway collar shirt in a dark indigo denim from Thomas Mason. This casual shirt is presented in a deep shape of indigo, designed to fade and wear over time resulting in a unique look after a few wears.
Styled with an extra cutaway collar and single cuffs, this shirt is designed to pair with hopsack jackets, and cotton trousers to take you through into Autumn.
Made from medium weight, breathable cotton and cut with a slim silhouette, single cuffs and high armhole for extra comfort and movement.
Features: - Extra Cutaway Collar - Single Cuffs - Single yoke - Indigo Denim - Mother of pearl buttons

Styled with an extra cutaway collar and single cuffs, this shirt is designed to pair with hopsack jackets, and cotton trousers to take you through into Autumn.
Made from medium weight, breathable cotton and cut with a slim silhouette, single cuffs and high armhole for extra comfort and movement.
Features: - Extra Cutaway Collar - Single Cuffs - Single yoke - Indigo Denim - Mother of pearl buttons

item.g:title: Shoe Horn
item.g:description:
Perfectly crafted from a single piece of horn, this 24" shoe horn is a luxury accessory, providing the perfect addition to your wardrobe.
No single piece of horn will have the same pattern or grain, making each piece unique.
Handmade especially for us by Abbey Horn in Leicester.

item.g:title: Cashmere Clothes Brush
item.g:description:
This elegant wooden clothes brush is made from pearwood, designed to be used with cashmere and other fine fibres. Brushing between wears helps to release natural oils that rejuvenate the yarns, always brush in one direction to remove lint and loose threads.
Handmade especially for us by Abbey Horn in Leicester.

item.g:title: Small Clothes Brush With Handle
item.g:description:
This elegant wooden clothes brush is made from beechwood, natural hog bristles with an Ox horn backing. Natural bristles are much kinder to clothes and therefore cause less damage.
Handmade especially for us by Abbey Horn in Leicester.

item.g:title: Small Rectangular Clothes Brush
item.g:description: Compact rectangular clothes brush that makes an ideal travelling companion, hand finished in pear wood with natural boar bristles and ox horn backing. Handmade especially for us by Abbey Horn in Leicester.

item.g:title: Peak Lapel Jacket in Navy Blue Wool Linen Hopsack - 36
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, peak lapel jacket, cut in a crisp navy blue hopsack wool and linen mix cloth from Italian mill Cerruti. Heavily textured and openweave, this cloth has a natural slub, giving the jacket a relaxed feel.
Fully lined with a tonal lining and featuring side patch pockets and welted top pocket.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Peak lapels – Soft shoulder – Two side patch pockets – One welted chest pocket – Fully Lined – Double vent – Wool & Linen mix

item.g:title: Wool Knitted Tie in Oyster
item.g:description:
Crafted from 100% knitted wool. This more relaxed style is designed to pair effortlessly with seasonal separates and suits, taking the edge off the formality, while retaining a stylish flair.
Textured yet soft to touch, styled with a pointed bottom, hanger loop and taped interior lining at the neck for support and structure when wearing.

item.g:description:
Our single breasted, notch lapel jacket, cut in a wool linen mix fabric from Marling & Evans.
This lightweight wool jacket has silk and linen mix, giving the jacket a gentle slub and textured handle. The herringbone design is perfectly paired with cream cotton trouser or denim and knitwear for a relaxed look.
Unlined with a tonal brown detailing and featuring side patch pockets and welted top pocket.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.

item.g:title: Worker Jacket in Navy Seersucker - 40
item.g:description:
A summertime staple cut in navy blue seersucker. Soft and airy, this jacket is designed to pair with lightweight knitwear or linen for a cool and crisp summer look. The textured seersucker helps to keep the cloth away from the skin, keeping you cool under the sun.
Inspired by the classic French worker garment, the jacket is unlined and deconstructed with three large patch pockets, three front buttons, an internal drawstring and button cuffs.
Features: - One breast patch breast pocket - Two patch pockets - Internal drawstring - Three button front - Horn buttons - Four button working cuff - Double vent - Stretch cotton mix

item.g:title: Peak Lapel Jacket in Oatmeal Hopsack Wool - 44
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, peak lapel jacket in a oatmeal open weavewool from Dormeuil. Cut with our signature peak lapel, this jacket is perfect for pairing with crisp wool trousers and knitwear for a cool summer look.
This textured hopsack wool is resistant to creasing, breathable and gives excellent drape and shape through the chest and waist.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.

item.g:title: Notch Lapel Jacket in Brown Herringbone Cashmere Wool - 36
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, notch lapel jacket, cut in a wool cashmere stretch fabric from famed Italian mill Cerruti.
This wool jacket has 10% cashmere and added stretch for supreme comfort. Lightweight enough for summer yet with enough weight to take you into autumn. The herringbone design is perfectly paired with cream cotton trouser or denim and knitwear for a relaxed look.
Lined with a tonal brown lining and featuring side patch pockets and welted top pocket.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features:
– Handmade – Notch lapels – Soft shoulder – One button fastening – Two side patch pockets – One welted chest pocket – Fully lined – Double vent – Wool & Cashmere mix

item.g:title: Notch Lapel Jacket in Natural Cream Checked Wool - 44
item.g:description:
Our single breasted, notch lapel jacket, crafted in an undyed, natural cream wool from Marling and Evans. This open weave wool is undyed, with the colour of the yarn come from the natural tones of the wool. Openweave, breathable and with a dry handle, this cloth is unique in its natural approach and style.
Buggy lined with a tonal cream lining and featuring side patch pockets and welted top pocket. This jacket is luxuriously soft and comfortable whilst retaining an elegant silhouette.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, pronounced waist and deep vent for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.

item.g:title: Safari Jacket in Chocolate Brown Suede - 38
item.g:description:
Cut from ultra soft suede, that will continue to improve with age, our suede safari jacket is a luxurious take on the practical classic.
This rich shade of chocolate brown features three front buttons, four patch pockets, handmade buttonholes and internal drawstring to cinch the waist.
With a supple hand feel, natural shoulder and tailored fit, this jacket adds an effortless touch to any casual outfit. An investment piece that will last a lifetime.
Features: – Two breast patch pocket – Two hip patch pockets – Three button front – Handmade buttonholes – Unlined – Double vent – 100% Suede

Safari Jacket in Heavyweight Grey Wool - 44
item.g:description:
A luxurious take on our classic safari jacket. Cut in an ultra soft wool from Drago, the fabric is waterproof, fully traceable and woven from 14.5 micron wool making it dense, yet soft with a smooth handle.
In a deep grey double faced wool, with a dark sage green interior. Featuring four front pockets with flaps, interior drawstring waist and four front buttons.
The Unique Series is a collection of exclusive garments, made to the highest standards, using rare and fabrics. Hand crafted in one off sizes and small runs, these garments reflect the finest in quality and attention to detail.
Features: – Handmade – Unlined with drawstring waist – Safari Collar – Soft shoulder – Four patch pockets with flaps – 100% Wool

item.g:title: Notch Lapel Jacket in Heavyweight Navy Cashmere - 36
item.g:description:
Few fabrics exhibit such quality and unparalleled levels of comfort as cashmere. From our Unique Series we present a notch lapel jacket crafted in ultra soft, heavyweight cashmere.
In a deep, rich blue, the cashmere has small flecks of white, giving a slight vintage feel. Cut in our signature Savile Row block, the jacket is unlined with soft shoulder, flap pockets and side vents.
Limited to one in each size.
The Unique Series is a collection of exclusive garments, made to the highest standards, using rare and fabrics. Hand crafted in one off sizes and small runs, these garments reflect the finest in quality and attention to detail.

item.g:title: Notch Lapel Jacket in Heavyweight Navy Cashmere - 46
item.g:description:
Few fabrics exhibit such quality and unparalleled levels of comfort as cashmere. From our Unique Series we present a notch lapel jacket crafted in ultra soft, heavyweight cashmere.
In a deep, rich blue, the cashmere has small flecks of white, giving a slight vintage feel. Cut in our signature Savile Row block, the jacket is unlined with soft shoulder, flap pockets and side vents.
Limited to one in each size.

item.g:title: Safari Jacket in Black Suede - 38
item.g:description:
Cut from ultra soft suede, that continues to improve with age, our suede safari jacket is a luxurious take on the practical classic.
This deep shade of black features three front buttons, four patch pockets, handmade buttonholes and internal drawstring to cinch the waist.
With a supple hand feel, natural shoulder and tailored fit, this jacket adds an effortless touch to any casual outfit. An investment piece that will last a lifetime.
Features: – Two breast patch pocket – Two hip patch pockets – Three button front – Handmade buttonholes – Unlined – Double vent – 100% Suede

item.g:title: Contrast Cutaway Collar Shirt in Sky Blue Poplin - 17 1/2"
item.g:description:
Our cutaway collar shirt in a sky blue poplin with contrast white collar. Designed to perfectly frame a tie, the contrast collar provides a pop of colour and formality, best worn with morning dress or crisp navy suit.
Made from light, breathable cotton poplin and cut with a slim silhouette, double cuffs and high armhole for extra comfort and movement.
Features: - Cutaway Collar - Double Cuffs - Single yoke - Fine poplin - Contrast collar - Mother of pearl buttons

item.g:title: Albert Thurston Boxcloth Braces in Chocolate Brown
item.g:description:
Manufactured since 1820, Albert Thurston are the benchmark of superior quality in gentlemen’s formal accessories. The boxcloth fabric is exclusive to Albert Thurston and with our range of colours and styles, we have you covered for every occasion.
Chocolate Brown boxcloth, 38mm braces, finished with solid nickel fittings and chocolate brown grain leather ends. Designed and made in the UK.

item.g:title: Albert Thurston Boxcloth Braces in Light Grey
item.g:description:
Manufactured since 1820, Albert Thurston are the benchmark of superior quality in gentlemen’s formal accessories. The boxcloth fabric is exclusive to Albert Thurston and with our range of colours and styles, we have you covered for every occasion.
Light grey boxcloth, 38mm braces, finished with solid nickel fittings and ivory leather ends. Designed and made in the UK.

item.g:description:

item.g:description:

Navy boxcloth, 38mm braces, finished with solid nickel fittings and black grain leather ends. Designed and made in the UK.

item.g:title: Albert Thurston Silk Moire Braces in Ivory
item.g:description:
Manufactured since 1820, Albert Thurston silk moire braces are the benchmark of superior quality in gentlemen’s formal accessories. Popularised by Daniel Craig, as James Bond, these silk moire braces are the last word in formal elegance.
Classic white silk moire braces, finished with solid nickel fittings, off white leather trim and white silk ends. Designed and made in the UK.

item.g:title: Cashmere Baseball Cap in Black
item.g:description:
A refined, classic interpretation of the baseball cap, made in an ultra soft, oatmeal cashmere mix.
Made in a deep black wool, featuring a quilted black cotton lining for supreme comfort with a concealed back strap and six panel construction. Made with a wool & cashmere mix from Loro Piana.

item.g:title: Cashmere Baseball Cap in Airforce Blue
item.g:description:
A refined, classic interpretation of the baseball cap, made in an ultra soft, oatmeal cashmere mix.
Made in a rich airforce blue wool, featuring a quilted black cotton lining for supreme comfort with a concealed back strap and six panel construction. Made with a wool & cashmere mix from Loro Piana.

item.g:title: Navy Blue Silk Scarf
item.g:description:
Inspired by the classic dress scarf, ours is woven in a heavyweight navy blue silk twill with a dense and luxurious handle.
Handmade for us by renowned silk and tie maker Adamley in Macclesfield, the scarf features hand knotted silk tassels and measure 150cm x 24xm.
100% Silk

item.g:title: Chocolate Brown Silk Scarf
item.g:description:
Inspired by the classic dress scarf, ours is woven in a heavyweight chocolate brown silk twill with a dense and luxurious handle.
Handmade for us by renowned silk and tie maker Adamley in Macclesfield, the scarf features hand knotted silk tassels and measure 150cm x 24xcm.
100% Silk

item.g:title: Double Breasted Peak Lapel Jacket in Navy Hopsack - 36
item.g:description:
Our double breasted, peak lapel jacket in a navy wool. With a dense handle, the hopsack wool allows the jacket to be both lightweight and structured. The wool is deep matte tone of navy, giving the jacket a subtle and refined finish. Ideal for pairing with denim and a crisp white shirt.
Crafted by hand with our natural, soft shoulder, buggy lining and pronounced waist for an elegant silhouette. Constructed with a hand padded lapel, full floating canvas and working buttonholes.
Features: – Handmade – Buggy lined – Peal lapels – Soft shoulder – Double Breasted – Two patch side pockets – One welted chest pocket – Double vent

item.g:title: Corduroy Shirt in Tan - 15"
item.g:description:
Made up in a beautifully soft 16 whale needle cord, our corduroy shirt comes in two rich colours - golden tan and deep green.
Hand made in our bespoke workshop, these shirts offer both comfort and style throughout the seasons. Pair with chinos or dark jeans for a considered casual look.
Features: - Two button cuff - Plain back - Single yoke - Left breast pocket - Button down collar - Mother of pearl buttons Available in collar sizes 15" - 16 1/2"

item.g:title: Garment Bag
item.g:description:
Making the best impression starts with your attire, so protect your suits and separates against creases with this signature shower proof garment bag.
Part of our garment care collection, it's cut from a durable shower resistant fabric, features a sturdy central zipper and reinforced metal ring for hangers.

item.g:title: Cotton Handkerchief - Navy/White Pin Spot
item.g:description: What could be more pleasingly classic than this cotton handkerchief in navy blue with white pin spots. Woven from the finest lightweight Italian cotton, it has a thin white inset border and is finished with impeccable style. Wear it simply folded into any jacket or blazer top pocket, for days at work or casual weekend events.

item.g:title: Cotton Handkerchief - Green/White Pin Spot
item.g:description: A dapper cotton handkerchief in green with white pin spots and a thin white inset border. Made in the finest lightweight Italian cotton, simply slip it into the top pocket of a well-cut jacket to show a lighthearted touch and impeccable attention to detail.

item.g:title: Cotton Handkerchief - Wine/White Pin Spot
item.g:description: This classic cotton handkerchief in wine with white pin spots is made from the finest lightweight Italian cotton. The rich wine colour contrasts handsomely with the white spots and white inset border. Give it a twist and pop into your jacket pocket for an added dash of style.

item.g:title: Cotton Handkerchief - Blue/White Pin Spot
item.g:description: This cotton handkerchief in blue with white pin spots has been created with classic elegance in mind. Made from the finest lightweight Italian cotton it features a micro polka-dot design with a fine white inset border. Wear with any suit or sports jacket, for work days or weekends.

item.g:title: Silk Dress Scarf - Navy with White Spots
item.g:description: Navy blue silk dress scarf with white pin spots and navy blue tassel detail. Made in England from the finest silk, this scarf will add a touch of class at any black tie event.

item.g:title: Gift Voucher - £75
item.g:description:
For the ultimate gift, what could be better than the experience of having a beautifully hand crafted, bespoke garment made? This stylish gift voucher can be used in payment toward any of our bespoke garments or bought in multiples to make up a larger sum of your choice.
How does it work? Beautifully wrapped, ready for any occasion, we send the voucher out to you or directly to the recipient of your choice. All the receiver then needs to do is book their appointment and let the bespoke process begin.
Read our gift voucher terms & conditions.

item.g:title: Wooden Suit Hanger - Set of 3
item.g:description:
This set of three moulded wooden suit hangers are designed with the ultimate garment care in mind, using the finest materials and finishes.
Each hanger is crafted from solid beech wood with curved ends to retain maximum shoulder shape in your suit jackets and keep them in tip top condition. With a subtle embossed Cad & The Dandy logo, these hangers are almost too good to hide in your wardrobe.

item.g:title: James Ince Walking Umbrella - French Blue
item.g:description:
Made by James Ince Umbrellas, this collection has been curated by the team at Cad & The Dandy with our customer firmly in mind. As the UK's longest established umbrella manufacturer, James Ince hand cut and finish each umbrella making them among the finest available. Crafted in a range of traditional and contemporary colours, they are the must-have accessory for an elegant look in unseasonable weather.
Scorched maple handle, gold cuff and gun metal trim.

item.g:title: Albert Thurston Silk Moire Braces in Black
item.g:description:
Manufactured since 1820, Albert Thurston silk moire braces are the benchmark of superior quality in gentlemen’s formal accessories. Popularised by Daniel Craig, as James Bond, these silk moire braces are the last word in formal elegance.
Classic black silk moire braces, finished with solid nickel fittings, black grain leather trim and black silk ends. Designed and made in the UK.

item.g:title: Black Satin Self Tie Bow Tie
item.g:description:
This 100% silk twill bow tie has been handmade for us by renowned silk and tie maker Adamley in Macclesfield.
Designed to be tied by hand, its versatility allows for it to be knotted to suit your individual style and adjusted as needed.
Presented in a plain silk satin in a rich black.

item.g:title: Black Grosgrain Self Tie Bow Tie
item.g:description:
This 100% silk twill bow tie has been handmade for us by renowned silk and tie maker Adamley in Macclesfield.
Designed to be tied by hand, its versatility allows for it to be knotted to suit your individual style and adjusted as needed.
Presented in a black ribber grosgrain silk in a rich black.

item.g:title: Albert Thurston Silk Moire Braces in White
item.g:description:
Manufactured since 1820, Albert Thurston silk moire braces are the benchmark of superior quality in gentlemen’s formal accessories. Popularised by Daniel Craig, as James Bond, these silk moire braces are the last word in formal elegance.
Classic white silk moire braces, finished with solid nickel fittings, off white leather trim and white silk ends. Designed and made in the UK.

item.g:title: James Ince Walking Umbrella - Black
item.g:description:
Made by James Ince Umbrellas, this collection has been curated by the team at Cad & The Dandy with our customer firmly in mind. As the UK's longest established umbrella manufacturer, James Ince hand cut and finish each umbrella making them among the finest available.
